text: Make it clear that they should not be afraid to ask questions. 10+ years into my career, I still routinely ask my coworkers questions to ensure that I'm actually delivering the right materials, and also to ensure that I understand the reason we have X guidelines on something even if I don't feel it looks correct  (happens a bit when data goes against aesthetics or what we think is right).
